Subject: Fall 2017 course search and registration status features available on Albert
Description: Please review the withdrawal schedule to determine when a grade of 'W' will be issued when dropping classes.

Subject: Registration Begins by appointment for Undergraduate, Graduate and Diploma students
Last day of initial registration on Albert for all students
Last day to drop fall 2017 classes and not receive a grade of "W"
Last day to drop/add on Albert for all students
All students who wish to perform initial registration or a registration transaction to add a class must go to their academic advisor or their academic department in order to initiate this request.
Description: Beginning today students who want to withdraw from a class should use the Request Class Withdrawal process.

Subject: Beginning today students will be issued a grade of 'W' if they drop a class from their fall schedule or withdraw for the term
Courses dropped after the first two weeks of the semester
Description: No refund of tuition or fees for Undergraduate, Graduate and Diploma students who are dropping classes, but will remain enrolled in at least one course.

Subject: Last day to use the Term Withdrawal Form to submit a fall semester term withdrawal request or submit a request to withdraw from a course
Description: Students should consult the academic calendar of their home school for specific deadlines pertaining to course withdrawal for the term.

Subject: Winter Recess for University Offices
Description:
The University, including the Office of the University Registrar, will be closed from Saturday, December 22, 2017 through Monday, January 1, 2018.
 
During this period requests for paper transcripts and enrollment certifications will not be processed.
